    Bizyness API Documentation v1.0.0

    Scroll down for code samples, example requests and responses. Select a language for code samples from the tabs above or the mobile navigation menu.

    Bizyness is an accounting software that helps entrepreneurs to manage their activities with ease.

    Introduction

    This API provides endpoints to manage the data in your Bizyness account.

    Authentication

    Bizyness offers two forms of authentication: - API Key - JWT Token

    Base URLs:

    • https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0

    • https://api.bizyness.fr

    Authentication

    • API Key (ApiKey)

      • Parameter Name: X-Api-Key, in: header.

    • HTTP Authentication, scheme: bearer

    Invoice

    Managing your invoices

    get__invoices

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    403 Response

    {
  "code": 403,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of invoices inline_response_200
    403 Forbidden Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/type,string/download"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/pdf")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/type,string"

    payload := strings.NewReader("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/lines/0/type\",\"value\":1}]")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PATCH", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/type,string"

    payload := strings.NewReader("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/lines/0/type\",\"value\":1}]")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PATCH", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}
